title: [BUG] [HarfBuzzSharp] [WASM] `Blob` Constructor leads to  `Assertion: should not be reached at /Uno.DotnetRuntime.WebAssembly/Uno.DotnetRuntime.WebAssembly`
body:
**Description**

Hi all 👋

i have an issue with text-rendering on Web Assembly. ~~Sorry if the `SkiaSharp` repository is not the correct place for this issue, but~~ i assume this could be caused by `HarfBuzzSharp`?  🤔

I'm using `SkiaSharp` in an `Uno.Wasm` application and try to render a `TextBlock` from [`TopTen.RichTextKit`](https://github.com/toptensoftware/RichTextKit). Which leads to the error below. 

i have tracked down the error and found out that it happens on creation of the `HarfBuzzSharp` `Blob` for the `Face` which is used to create the `Font`.
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/80860aacf39a4ce9c403a36bd87ee414af1ba005/source/SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz/SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz.Shared/BlobExtensions.cs#L24

Here is the browser error console log:
<details>
  <summary>Click to expand!</summary>

it would be nice to have advanced text rendering working on wasm
